body.name: DERMA E Radiance Toner – Facial Toner with Glycolic Acid and Rooibos – Brightening and Exfoliating Toning Solution Refreshes and Purifies Skin, 6 oz
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: BRIGHTENING FACE TONER: Tone, tighten and brighten the skin with DERMA E Radiance Toner. The antioxidant facial toner promotes natural skin regeneration, as it deeply cleanses and detoxifies
POWERFUL GLYCOLIC ACID: Gently exfoliating dead skin cells to reveal the luminous complexion beneath, this Glycolic Acid toner helps to even skin tone by lightening the appearance of dark spots
ALL NATURAL FORMULA: Our blend of botanicals including Rooibos and Rosehip Extracts help to moisturize, revive and regenerate skin leaving it soft, supple and with a fresh and radiant glow
DAILY SKIN CARE: For best results, apply the toning solution to a cotton pad and sweep across the face and neck after cleansing. Use in the morning and evening to prep skin for DERMA E moisturizer

DERMA E: Clean beauty products that harness nature’s most effective ingredients. 100% vegan and cruelty-free, our eco-ethical skin care products contain no parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, petrolatum, lanolin, gluten, soy or GMOs, and are supplied in recyclable packaging
body.description: This detoxifying and exfoliating facial toner tightens and brightens skin, while perfectly preparing it for serums and moisturizers. The alcohol-free face toner lifts away impurities and exfoliates the surface of the skin, gently removing dead skin cells to reveal a fresh and luminous complexion. Glycolic Acid and herbal ingredients combine to brighten skin and even tone, lightening the appearance of dark spots. Skin looks and feels soft, smooth and healthy.Ideal for dull and discolored skin, acne scarring and hyperpigmentation, apply the toning solution to a cotton pad and sweep gently over face and neck after cleansing, avoiding eye area. For best results, use in the morning and evening to prep skin for your favorite DERMA E Moisturizer.KEY BENEFITS- Exfoliating and detoxifying facial toner leaves skin soft and radiant.- The skin brightening formula lightens dark spots and uneven tone.- Perfect prep for moisturization.CLEAN, ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTSThis facial toner is packed full of skin-loving ingredients: exfoliating Glycolic Acid helps to reveal brighter, fresher skin; Rooibos helps to detox, encouraging healthy skin; and Rosehip Extract helps to brighten and rejuvenate.DERMA E Radiance Toner is 100% vegan and cruelty-free, and does not contain parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, lanolin, gluten or GMOs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All Natural 100% vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, sulfate-free, mineral oil-free, lanolin-free, gluten free, GMO-free. DERMA E Essentials Radiance Toner Benefits This toner rebalances, rejuvenates, nourishes and hydrates your skin. Includes highly sought after Glycolic Acid to effortlessly exfoliate, revealing younger-looking, glowing skin. Renowned Rosehip Extract is our secret to a radiant, more youthful complexion. Rejuvenates, rebalances, nourishes and hydrates. Exfoliates and deeply cleanses pores for soft, smooth skin. Revives, detoxifies and purifies for a fresh appearance. Tones, tightens and brightens for a youthful glow.

Alcohol-Free Essentials Radiance Toner This alcohol-free, exfoliating, beauty toner helps to tone, tighten and brighten for a soft, smooth and luminous appearance. Glycolic Acid helps to remove dead skin cells for younger-looking skin while an exceptional blend of botanicals including Rooibos and Rosehip extracts help to revive skin for a fresh, radiant complexion.

No Harmful Preservatives Quality Ingredients: Part of our core ethos is being completely transparent about the ingredients we use. We are proud to state all of the ingredients included in our products on all of our packaging and individual product pages. We are also happy to provide a comprehensive list of all the ingredients we formulate with below: Purified Water, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid; Actimoist Bio-1), Polysorbate 20, Sodium Hydroxide, Pinus Pinaster (Pycnogenol) Bark Extract, Panthenol (Provitamin B5), Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Leaf Extract, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Extract*, Allantoin, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract*, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Natural Fragrance Oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my skin glow!
reviews.reviewText: I was never the type to use toners but I think I'm hooked! Gently exfoliating and works well with my sensitive skin. My skin definitely has a brighter glow now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make your skin looks so good
reviews.reviewText: The product really works on my combination skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for me
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this toner for years now. I no longer have red blotches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something gentle and effective for my combination skin. I live in Nevada and it’s dry here so I use a mild cleanser, this toner, hyaluronic acid serum and facial oil with a light moisturizer. Great quality product that doesn’t break my skin out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this twice daily for years. My skin looks very good for my 81 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for pores.
reviews.reviewText: Love the rosemary for Soft skin .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not For My Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: For my sensitive somewhat dry skin this toner is just too strong. Leaves parts of my face red & irritated. Not blaming the product--this is just how it reacts on my skin. I'd advise anyone with sensitive skin to beware. Still love & use Derma E serums and moisturizers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Derma e products
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Derma e Radiance Toner for quite some time. It has Glycolic Acid as well as Rooibos in the ingredients which, I feel, make such a difference for my skin as a toner. I have used non-alcohol Witch Hazel for a toner but it doesn't give me the glowing feel to my skin as Derma e Radiance Toner. I have recommended it to friends and I stand by it as a wonderful toner for your face. I have sensitive skin (occasional Rosacea) and this product is fine with it. I actually feel that it has helped!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have seen this product in some videos from dermatologists and I am so happy that I purchased

Excellent toner! I was worried about it causing a rash on my face, as I do have sensitive skin but the results have been anything but that! I love this toner, it cleans off the excess debris wonderfully and makes my face feel clean! I will buy again, again and again :).

Me encantó este tóner para mi piel grasa. Exfoliar muy bien y no me deja con la piel seca o estirada. No deja radiante la piel como el nombre dice pero si ha quitado marcas y puntos negros con el uso. tarda 5 semanas más o menos en actuar

Llevo 7 semanas usándolo y mis manchas de acné que tuve por el embarazo han ido despareciendo poco a poco, mi piel es muy sensible porque soy muy blanca y no tuve reacción alguna más que tener la piel más suave y con menos marcas.
